title: Error while compiling Ethcore Parity

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I've been trying to get parity to compile for a few days now .. and I keep getting this error, I have tried, stable, beta and nightly ..  this is the error I get : ( I cut the top of the output off and left just the part where it breaks ) - I have not looked to see if this has been logged already .. there are way too many issues to wade through to see if this is a duplicate ) 

Compiling ethcrypto v0.1.0 (file:///files/src/parity/ethcrypto)
   Compiling parity-reactor v0.1.0 (file:///files/src/parity/util/reactor)
   Compiling rocksdb v0.4.5 (https://github.com/ethcore/rust-rocksdb#64c63ccb)
   Compiling reqwest v0.2.0
   Compiling docopt v0.6.80
   Compiling semver-parser v0.6.1
   Compiling igd v0.5.1
   Compiling env_logger v0.3.3
   Compiling fetch v0.1.0 (file:///files/src/parity/util/fetch)
   Compiling semver v0.5.1
error: internal compiler error: /buildslave/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/librustc/hir/map/mod.rs:395: node 37599 is inlined but not present in map

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', /buildslave/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:423
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.

Build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: Could not compile `ethcore-util`.

This is the build script I use .. if you do this it should get the same error since I've done it on 3 different machines and it does the same .. ( nightly is uncommented .. and generates the above error  - but if you uncomment any of the others you will get something similar ) ...

clear
echo Deleting Rust
sleep 1
rm -rf ~/.multirust
rm -rf ~/.cargo

echo Installing New Rust
curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- --default-toolchain nightly -y
#curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- --default-toolchain beta -y
#curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s --

export PATH="~/.cargo/bin:$PATH"

echo Updating Parity.. from GIT
sleep 1
rm -rf /files/src/parity
git clone --recursive https://github.com/ethcore/parity

echo Building release version of parity
cd /files/src/parity
~/.cargo/bin/cargo build --release
